quote: Death is as sure for that which is born, as birth is for that which is dead. Therefore grieve not for what is inevitable. – Bhagavad Gita
fact: Elephants only sleep for two hours each day.
joke: Did you know Albert Einstein was a real person? All this time, I thought he was just a theoretical physicist!
